solution_line_template: Dennis had {initial_rocks}/{eaten_divisor}=<<{initial_rocks}/{eaten_divisor}={rocks_after_eating}>>{rocks_after_eating} rocks left after the fish ate them.
He made the fish spit {spit_out_rocks} out, which left Dennis with {rocks_after_eating}+{spit_out_rocks}=<<{rocks_after_eating}+{spit_out_rocks}={remaining_rocks}>>{remaining_rocks} rocks.
